description:
HP Palm Hot Apps winner!

The WebOS messaging application supports over 20 emoticons, if you know what codes to enter. Also includes 1 animated emoticon and 3 emoticons that can be sent to any phone that supports MMS and links to check out the paid versions. This simple application provides a list of the supported emoticons and allows you to compose messages using them. Once you enter your message, just click on the messaging icon and Emoticons Free will launch the messaging application and enter your message automatically. Most of these emoticons only work on WebOS phones and will show up as the character code on other phones. Unfortunately, I cannot fix that :-)
